name: Gmail Tool
natural_language_description: 这是 Gmail Tool 节点。主要用于: Consume the Gmail API

preBuiltAgentsCalloutGmail.displayName: Sort your Gmail inbox using our pre-built
preBuiltAgentsCalloutGmail.name: preBuiltAgentsCalloutGmail
preBuiltAgentsCalloutGmail.natural_language_description: 参数名: Sort your Gmail inbox using our pre-built

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Consume the Gmail API | (必填项)

authentication.name: authentication
authentication.natural_language_description: 参数名: Authentication | 默认值: oAuth2

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: message

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: getAll

messageId.name: messageId
messageId.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
messageId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Message Snippet or ID | 作用: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

threadNotice.displayName: To reply to an existing thread, specify the exact subject title of that thread.
threadNotice.name: threadNotice
threadNotice.natural_language_description: 参数名: To reply to an existing thread, specify the exact subject title of that thread.

emailType.name: emailType
emailType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Email Type | 默认值: text | (必填项)

message.name: message
message.natural_language_description: 参数名: Message | 提示: Get better Text and Expressions writing experience by using the expression editor | (必填项)

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: returnOnlyMessages (值: None) - Whether to return only thread messages

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 50

name.name: name
name.natural_language_description: 参数名: Name | 作用: Label Name | (必填项)

labelId.name: labelId
labelId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Label ID | 作用: The ID of the label | (必填项)

simple.name: simple
simple.description: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data
simple.natural_language_description: 参数名: Simplify | 作用: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data | 默认值: True

filtersNotice.displayName: Fetching a lot of messages may take a long time. Consider using filters to speed things up
filtersNotice.name: filtersNotice
filtersNotice.natural_language_description: 参数名: Fetching a lot of messages may take a long time. Consider using filters to speed things up

filters.name: filters
filters.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filters | 默认值: {}
available_options: includeSpamTrash (值: None) - Whether to include threads from SPAM and TRASH in the results
labelIds (值: None) - Only return threads with labels that match all of the specified label IDs. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.
q (值: None) - Only return messages matching the specified query
receivedAfter (值: None) - Get all emails received after the specified date. In an expression you can set date using string in ISO format or a timestamp in miliseconds.
receivedBefore (值: None) - Get all emails received before the specified date. In an expression you can set date using string in ISO format or a timestamp in miliseconds.

labelIds.name: labelIds
labelIds.description: Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression
labelIds.natural_language_description: 参数名: Label Names or IDs | 作用: Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression | 默认值: [] | (必填项)

responseType.name: responseType
responseType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Response Type | 默认值: approval
available_options: Approval (值: approval) - User can approve/disapprove from within the message
Free Text (值: freeText) - User can submit a response via a form
Custom Form (值: customForm) - User can submit a response via a custom form

defineForm.name: defineForm
defineForm.natural_language_description: 参数名: Define Form | 默认值: fields

jsonOutput.name: jsonOutput

formFields.name: formFields
formFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Form Elements | 默认值: {}

approvalOptions.name: approvalOptions
approvalOptions.natural_language_description: 参数名: Approval Options | 默认值: {}

threadId.name: threadId
threadId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Thread ID | (必填项)
